name: 希望之城 The City Of Hope
name_original: 希望之城 The City Of Hope
description:
Your kingdom has only one piece of land left, and the enemies seem determined not to spare you. How you rebuild a city in a limited time and defeat the powerful invaders depends on your choices.

Build a defense system

Construct several different types of defense towers or deploy your army to resist the enemy's attacks.

Cards

Every day, use randomly generated cards from a pool of over 100 different cards to construct the city, build defenses, establish barracks, and more.

Rich equipment system

Choose from dozens of different equipment options that suit your game strategy to make the game more enjoyable and entertaining.
